articles.title: The decision Harry and Meghan made that 'will come back to haunt them' - Marca English
articles.description:
Former Vanity Fair editor Graydon Carter has expressed his belief that Prince Harry and Meghan Markle will eventually regret not having good relationships with their relatives.
